name: 8 Ball 3D pool Billiards
description:
Are you expert in billiard? Step to play this game for perfection in the world famous highbrow.
This game is an accumulation of 8 balls over diversified pools with a number of sticks and players. Monotony of game is evacuated by a variety of levels from easy to difficult. Technically woven levels of 8 ball Xtreme has three modes of play, Arcade and two players.
Let's play with your friend in a friendly atmosphere.
Definitely promoting the sense of real game pool, making you experienced snooker challenge with customized levels and 3D Xtrem quality.
The super ball pool is constituted to develop a strong competitive touch, take the challenge of Pool tournament filled with contestant contribution like 1 vs 1, beat your partner, play it intellectually, shootout the coloring ball by cue and win Stars. Cue will pass them one by one.
One of the amazing quality of 3D game is hypothecal precision measuring ability, view the possible direction of the ball before the strike with abstract arrow pointers. It helps you in correct ball collision.
The awesome Pool ball game is characterized by all the essential elements of the actual Snooker Pool. Multiple rotational camera conveniently establishes the total view of the table and strengthens the possibility of strike the ball from all sides of the table.
Interconnected levels openly with the success of the level played. Unlock the locked level gradually.


Features
• Stunning 3D graphic animation
• Interconnected games level
• Stimulating playing modes; I.e. Arcade, Practice, Two players
• Excellent Competitive environment
• Real life experience of Billiard
• Magnificent customized cue and pool function
• Striking sound and definite coloring touch

How to play:
Practice Mode:
Practice mode play and prepare yourself for the real match pot all the balls and remember the rules.

2) Arcade Mode (New and no rules)
You need to pocket all the balls on the table. There are 8 levels in Arcade Mode.

3) VS Mode: Player vs. Computer / Player (with rules)
Play against computer AI / Player with standard 8 ball rules or 9 ball rules. Touch the screen to adjust the direction and drag down the power-up in the RIGHT to strike.
